price: Ni wale ambao juhudi yao katika maisha ya dunia imepotea bure, nao wanadhani kwamba wanafanya kazi nzuri.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعۡيُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا
footnotes: Ni hao vilio haribika vitendo vyao katika maisha ya duniani kwa kuharibika itikadi yao, na hali wao wanaitakidi kuwa ndio wanafanya vitendo vyema!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ḍalla saʿyuhum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum yaḥsabūna annahum yuḥ'sinūna ṣun'ʿan
